description: Provides additional features to interact with the runtime

events.name: onDisable
events.description: An event that triggers when the add-on is about to get unloaded for an indetermined amount of time (usually, due to the add-on being disabled by the user or uninstalled). [currently not implemented: Event listeners will execute to their completion and may return a promise to further delay the unload until that promise resolved. Note that implementations may impose a short time limit to ensure the add-on actually unloads, it is intentionally impossible to prevent the add-on from becoming disabled.]
